revised_title: Charles Robert Harington: A Pioneering Biochemist and Administrator
tldr: Charles Robert Harington was a distinguished biochemist and administrator who made significant contributions to the field of biochemistry. He was also the director of the National Institute for Medical Research and was widely respected for his integrity and judgment. Harington was a member of the ancient Harington family, with a long history of service and influence in English society. His work and legacy continue to be remembered and studied by scientists and historians alike.
